description: Returns a summary of your Personal Access Tokens.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token from the previous response to query the next page.

nested_items.name: PersonalAccessTokenSummaries
nested_items.description: Lists all the personal tokens in an organization or user, if user ID is provided.

nested_items.name: PersonalAccessTokenId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Personal Access Token.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The user ID of the WorkMail user associated with the Personal Access Token.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Personal Access Token.

nested_items.name: DateCreated
nested_items.description: The date when the Personal Access Token was created.

nested_items.name: DateLastUsed
nested_items.description: The date when the Personal Access Token was last used.

nested_items.name: ExpiresTime
nested_items.description: The date when the Personal Access Token will expire.

nested_items.name: Scopes
nested_items.description: Lists all the Personal Access Token permissions for a mailbox.
